All meetings are about communication and dialogue.
So, make sure that all participants can clearly hear what you're saying.
Please also remember to perform a sound check of your equipment...
Make sure to establish equal meeting conditions for all participants.
Avoid sitting together as a group in a meeting room.
...and let everybody sit in their own location connected to the meeting.
Make sure to always be well-organized and avoid talking at the same time.
Virtual meetings require good organization and discipline.
